title: ICE: -Wsingle-use-lifetimes: `Span must not be empty and have no suggestion` with debug assertions

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

labels.name: requires-debug-assertions
labels.description: This issue requires debug-assertions in some way

body:
### Code ```Rust fn with(f: &fn<'a>(x: &'a int) -> R) -> R { f(&3) } fn return_it<'a>() -> &'a int { with(|o| o) } fn main() { let x = return_it(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` 5b8f284536d00ba649ca968584bedab4820d8527 ``` ### Error output Needs a rustc built with debug assertions, `rustc -Wsingle-use-lifetimes ` ``` error: function pointer types may not have generic parameters --> ee6ed3b0d76f631f872a8993a91541f02a62d1af.rs:1:18 | 1 | fn with(f: &fn<'a>(x: &'a int) -> R) -> R { | ^^^^ | help: consider moving the lifetime parameter to a `for` parameter list | 1 - fn with(f: &fn<'a>(x: &'a int) -> R) -> R { 1 + fn with(f: &for<'a> fn(x: &'a int) -> R) -> R { | error[E0412]: cannot find type `int` in this scope --> ee6ed3b0d76f631f872a8993a91541f02a62d1af.rs:1:30 | 1 | fn with(f: &fn<'a>(x: &'a int) -> R) -> R { | ^^^ | | | not found in this scope | help: perhaps you intended to use this type: `i32` error[E0412]: cannot find type `int` in this scope --> ee6ed3b0d76f631f872a8993a91541f02a62d1af.rs:5:27 | 5 | fn return_it<'a>() -> &'a int { | ^^^ | | | not found in this scope | help: perhaps you intended to use this type: `i32` ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `Some(SubstitutionPart { span: ee6ed3b0d76f631f872a8993a91541f02a62d1af.rs:1:16: 1:16 (#0), snippet: "" })`, right: `None`: Span must not be empty and have no suggestion', /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust_debug_assertions/compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic.rs:627:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f7c45b6e141 -
